name: Umut Tarlalari
overview: Umut Tarlaları (Fields of Hope) is a strategy game about managing a farm. Players need to manage a variety of fields, greenhouses, crops, cattle, poultry. The various types of items then need to be sold on markets and as the farm increases in size, production needs to be scaled with larger factories and staff management. Players need to take into account the game world, and economic, geographic and climate conditions. The game can be played against computer-controlled opponents or two additional human players. The visual design consists of various menus and screens, different for each type of operation, but all elements are also illustrated with bright graphics.
